name: Find Fast Animals
description:
Find Fast Animals. This version contains images of animals and is an immersing game designed to test the player's observational skills. Highly entertaining, pleasant and addictive, players must find the differences in a set of images and they need to do it fast. Publish your scores on Game Center and compare your result with other players from around the globe. The game also supports Facebook and Twitter.

Features
- HD graphics
- Game Center
- Leaderboard
- Facebook
- Twitter
- Awesome sound effects
- Easy to play
- Low battery consumption
